com.ushahidi.java.sdk

Class Payload<M extends Model>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ushahidi.java.sdk.net.BaseUshahidiHttpClient
      • com.ushahidi.java.sdk.net.UshahidiHttpClient
        • com.ushahidi.java.sdk.Payload<M>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CategoriesTask, CommentsTask, CountriesTask, LocationTask, ReportsTask, SystemInfoTask

    public abstract class Payload<M extends Model>
extends UshahidiHttpClient
    An abstract class to be implemented by all API calls. This is the actual payload as received from the server via an API call.
    Author:
    eyedol
